summary: This module configures Sphinx to build the Ansys MAPDL Python API documentation and supplies helper utilities for customizing the generated output, such as a reST directive that can hide or remove HTML elements based on CSS classes or IDs.
business_intent: Enable automated, theme-consistent generation of up-to-date documentation for the Ansys MAPDL Python API, while allowing fine-grained control over the visibility of specific HTML components in the rendered pages.
